Troll thread?

If it is, I don't care. This is like a cross between Angry Birds and Goat Simulator. I like it.

Another bad joke you have to pay too much money for. Making "funny" broken games is not a good thing to do. Goat simulator is only interesting for 30 minutes, then you get bored of the same spazzing goat all the time. You could have spent that money on something better. So now developers rip off goat simulator by making these "funny" games with tiny effort just so they can get money.
